You are very special.

Hi. It seems that you have gotten a card from me. Well let me introduce myself, my name is Joseph Chiocchi, and sometimes I go by YOLK.

You need help pronouncing that? Well there is a video just for that.

I don't give my card out to just anyone so that must make you a very special person.

I am currently attending the School of the Art Institute of Chicago with a focus of Art & Technology. In layman's terms I'm attending a highly-conceptual school with a focus on a medium that is just emerging, with limitless possibilities.

I am interested in freelance work, so if you wanna talk - email me at joe@yolk.cc, or call me at (201) 252-6551.
